title: Designates a portion of state route 434 in the county of Tioga as the "Ronald Reagan Memorial Highway"
summary: Designates a portion of state route 434 in the county of Tioga as the "Ronald Reagan Memorial Parkway".
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

           S. 2751                                                  A. 3985

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                             S E N A T E - A S S E M B L Y

                                   February 1, 2011
                                      ___________

       IN  SENATE -- Introduced by Sen. LIBOUS -- read twice and ordered print-
         ed, and when printed to be committed to the Committee  on  Transporta-
         tion

       IN  ASSEMBLY  -- Introduced by M. of A. FINCH, TOBACCO, McDONOUGH, KATZ,
         D. MILLER -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M.  of A. CALHOUN, HAWLEY, McLAUGH-
         LIN, MOLINARO -- read once and referred to the Committee on  Transpor-
         tation

       AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of
         the  state highway system in the county of Tioga as the "Ronald Reagan
         Memorial Highway"

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The highway law is amended by adding a new section 343-y to
    2  read as follows:
    3    S  343-Y.  PORTION OF THE STATE HIGHWAY SYSTEM TO BE DESIGNATED AS THE
    4  "RONALD REAGAN MEMORIAL HIGHWAY". ALL THAT PORTION OF THE STATE  HIGHWAY
    5  SYSTEM  IN  THE  COUNTY  OF  TIOGA CONSTITUTING STATE ROUTE FOUR HUNDRED
    6  THIRTY-FOUR FROM STATE ROUTE NINETY-SIX IN THE  TOWN  OF  OWEGO  TO  THE
    7  WESTERN BOUNDARY OF THE TOWN OF VESTAL, IN THE COUNTY OF BROOME SHALL BE
    8  DESIGNATED AND KNOWN AS THE "RONALD REAGAN MEMORIAL HIGHWAY".
    9    S  2. The commissioner of transportation shall provide for the instal-
   10  lation and maintenance of adequate signing of the state  highway  system
   11  as  designated  pursuant  to  section one of this act. However, to avoid
   12  confusion and to limit any possible disruption of commerce,  the  desig-
   13  nation  called  for  pursuant to section one of this act shall be one of
   14  ceremonial nature and the official name of such  highway  shall  not  be
   15  changed as a result of this act.
   16    S 3. This act shall take effect immediately.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03813-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the state highway system in the county of Tioga as the "Ronald Reagan Memorial Highway"
